articles.title: Salman Khan, father receive threat letter; case registered
articles.description: An anonymous letter issuing dire threats to Bollywood actor Salman Khan and his father, writer Salim Khan, was found near the Bandra Bandstand promenade on Sunday. An offence has been registered against unidentified persons at Bandra police station.
